title: Overview
description: A project overview is a detailed description of a project's goals and objectives, the steps to achieve these goals, and the expected outcomes. In addition, a project overview enables you to outline the project schedule, budget, necessary resources, and status

title: Instructor
description: As a project management instructor, your duties are to develop a curriculum for project management-related classes. Your responsibilities are primarily teaching classes and providing guidance to students in your class.

title: Review
description: The Fourth Industrial Revolution, 4IR, or Industry 4.0,[1] conceptualizes rapid change to technology, industries, and societal patterns and processes in the 21st century due to increasing interconnectivity and smart automation
